I really love this shirt, it is the perfect under-jacket or layering under-sweater piece. I love the scoop neckline that allows adapting to more style choices and weather. I ordered s small, as a 34B / 35.5" bust and 30 inch waist, and it fits perfectly, but snug. If I wanted a looser fit I would size up to medium, but I am happy enough with the small and it encourages me to stay in shape.  Definitely recommend, especially at the value price point. I am going to buy an assortment of colors and have a better fall - winter wardrobe because of ithese.

The fit could be more flattering. The material is not that see-through which is great. The fabric is quite thick. The ribbed material is not bad and comfortable. The neckline is just abit high and not that flattering.
I love how well this long-sleeved white shirt fits me. The fabric feels really nice and the quality is decent. It's the perfect basic top and looks just like it does in the photo.

My wife really loves this brand of shirt/top and has several in different styles and colors. They fit true to size, are comfortable, and the fabric is heavy and thick and has some weight to it, as opposed to a regular t-shirt. Also, the fabric is not see through due to its thick/heavy nature. Highly recommended.

I’m pleasantly surprised by the fabric quality! It’s stretchy but returns to its natural form unlike some lower quality shirts. It has almost a silky feel to it.  After washing in cold water and drying on low there was some shrinkage but since the material is quite stretchy it wasn’t really an issue.  Great option if you’re looking for a summer longsleeve!
It's the perfect simple long sleeve scoop neck. The fabric is soft, the sleeves are long, and it is fitted but not too tight.

评论概述: Stretchy and soft, not see-through in white
评论详情: AUTOMET Womens Long Sleeve Shirts Scoop Neck Tops Ribbed Knit is a very nice basic to have in your closet.  It's made of a medium-weight rib knit fabric, which means the white is not see-through at all. The ribbing makes the fabric extra-stretchy. It is a very soft garment. The white is a pure white, no tint at all. The neckline is low, but not cleavage bearing for me. Feminine though.  While the sleeves are long for me, I think they are probably a true size small long sleeve length.  Nice top. Recommend!

评论概述: It's see through with soft fabric but a weird cut and a weird fit
评论详情: Although soft texture with the fabric, and a beautiful bright white color it just is see through completely. Also the fit is so strange around the neck and arms. I can't wear this!! I would have snapped a picture but it's see through. Thumbs down

Thick material and flattering fit. Not sure why bu mine felt damp when it arrived. I immediately put it in the wash. I like it and it will be great for cool summer nights and inthe fall/ winter seasons.

AUTOMET Long Sleeve Shirt is a great choice if you love ribbed style tops.  Key observations:  - The 8% spandex gives the shirt a nice fitted form. - 46% cotton offers a soft sensation on your skin. - 46% rayon gives the fabric a higher level of integrity to withstand washing and wear. - The pink color is vibrant and quite pretty. - Scoop neckline has a notable hemline that is well crafted. - I inspected the stitching throughout - no visible flaws were identified. - The bottom of the shirt has a subtle flare. - Sleeve length is perfect... not too long nor too short.  This top is true to size based on their chart. Top quality material that feels nice and looks good. The AUTOMET Scoop Neck Ribbed Shirt is a terrific choice and a good value.

评论概述: Well stitched and comfortable, slim-fitting ribbed long-sleeve scoop-neck shirt
评论详情: Perfect for various occasions — from casual outings to dressier events — this shirt is a great addition to any woman's wardrobe. The ribbed fabric adds texture and depth, making the material visually appealing while also providing a comfortable and snug fit. The slim-fit style accentuates my frame without being too tight. The scoop-neck design adds a touch of elegance and femininity, offering a subtle yet stylish look. The material is a bit thick for summer, but come autumn, it will be among my favorites to wear under overalls, jeans, etc. Whether you choose to dress it up with a skirt or dress pants or opt for a more casual look with jeans, this fashionable and versatile shirt is sure to become a go-to piece in your wardrobe.

I got this comfortable tee in black and wow, is it beautiful! I love the ribbing style and the scoop neckline. To me it's more a tee to wear in the fall as it has this almost 'fur' feel in the sleeves so it feels super warm and cozy. It is form fitting and feels wonderfully comfortable. I wear a medium and it's true to size. Honestly I can't say anything negative about it!

This top arrived quickly and was packaged securely to prevent damage. The materiel is ribbed, it feels nice and has a ton of stretch. It’s thick enough that it’s not terribly see through, although I would still suggest wearing a light bra underneath. The stitching looks nice, there were no losses are hanging strings, honestly I’m quite impressed with the quality. I like that it’s long enough to cover my stomach, it’s not cropped. Definitely recommend!
Good quality. Exactly as described. Normal sizing was correct. The color looked amazing with my daughters tanned skin. The fabric was very soft. She loved this shirt.

评论概述: Great fabric, nice fit, no flaws
评论详情: This top is exactly what I expected and was looking for. It’s well constructed and doesn’t look cheap like some other tops you buy online, and there are no design or construction flaws. The fabric is a nice quality and looks flattering, and it is fully opaque. Really nice—see pic!

I chose this black top in a size small so I do believe it runs true to size. This is exactly what I was looking for. This is just the most simple yet perfect slim fitting top that you could dress up or dress down. The fabric is a medium weight material and is comfortable and does have some stretch, even though it is a tight fitting style. I think the price is extremely fair as well. I would get this in multiple colors.
